titles.title: open the eyes of my heart lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Open the Eyes of my Heart Lord
Open the Eyes of my Heart
I want to see you,
I want to see you

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To see you high and lifted up
Shining in the light of your glory
Pour out your power and love
as we sing holy, holy, holy

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Holy, Holy, Holy,
Holy, Holy, Holy,
Holy, holy, holy...
I want to see you.
